title: Bug 42724: StyledText selection rendered incorrectly on bidi platforms
description: I don't believe we even need to redraw the entire selection background anymore because there is code in StyledTextRenderer.drawLine that creates a style range for the selection.
OB: The selection background is being redrawn incorrectly on bidi platforms.
EB: drawLineSelectionBackground should only be used to render the special line break selection.
SR:
1. Open a document with bidi text on a platform with bidi support.
2. Select a portion of the text.
3. Observe the incorrect rendering of the selection background.
